Text: Once I try and use the crack I am getting a system error saying " The program can't start because LIBMYSQL.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem. When I do that it gives me the same thing. Can you please help?
The only extra files you might need are the VB6 runtime files. They can be found at this URL - http://support.microsoft.com/kb/192461

@detroitrob - If you can't get this patch to work there is a pre-cracked exe you can download. It's bigger but the crack is already applied. Just know that you will have to download a new patched exe for every future update. http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7177995
I keep getting the error "Component 'comlg32.ocx' or one of it's dependencies is missing or invalid.
gonna try that..if it doesnt work ill try it on my other computer.
@padoodle Check my response to another question above. Grab the VB6 runtime files from the Microsoft site. The file you are missing is included in there.
I downloaded them and am getting the same error.  Where do you "put" the patch? Sorry if it's a stupid question...

Okay, if you downloaded the VB6 runtime files then you have to run that exe to install them. It might require a reboot after, I'm honestly not sure. But as far as the patch goes, you don't have to put it anywhere specific. You just run the exe that you downloaded from this torrent. There is a single button and some instructions. Just click the button and browse to ootp13.exe (c:program filesout of the park developmentootp13" or wherever you installed it to. That is it. It will patch ootp13.exe and you will be able to register the game with any serial. It's that simple. If you can't get the patch workign then feel free to download the the already patched exe. The link is in one of my previous comments in here.
When I get to the OOTP13 screen where u enter in the serial #..what do i enter in there or is this patch supposed to bypass that?

If you ran the patch correctly and it told you that the patch was successful then, in the OOTP13 screen, click the button to enter a serial and enter any serial you want. Just type a few numbers or something in there. Anything should work.
thank you! that worked
You're welcome. When they release a new patch for the game, just update the game normally and patch it again. It should keep working for future OOTP13 updates.
